Summary Note:
Céline Gisèle Schneider and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Céline Gisèle Schneider is a 42 year old Biotech Startup Founder from Switzerland.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Céline Gisèle Schneider and Gasser tied the knot in 2010. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Céline completed her secondary education at Kantonsschule Sursee Luzern in 2001.
Céline finished her studies at Suffolk University in Geneva in 2006.
Occupation History:
Céline Gisèle Schneider is a 42 year old Biotech Startup Founder from Switzerland.
At Roche Holding AG, Céline Gisèle Schneider held the position of Research Scientist from 2007 to 2009, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at Novartis AG, where she continued to grow professionally from 2011 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 300000 CHF.
She has townhouse located in St. Gallen, worth 2310000 CHF.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1720000 CHF from her late grandfather, a renowned Oil and Gas Executive, in 2012.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Céline as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
